mapper.select: SELECT AS_NO AS ASNO, REG_TIMESTAMP AS CREATEDATE, COMP_NAME AS COMPNAME, TID_MODEL_NAME TIDMODELNAME, CASE WHEN TERMINAL_ID IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE TERMINAL_ID END AS TERMINALID, CASE WHEN SERIAL_NO IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE SERIAL_NO END AS SERIALNO, CASE WHEN CID IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE CID END AS CID, CASE WHEN SAM_FLAG IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE SAM_FLAG END AS SAMFLAG, CASE WHEN TE.NAME IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE TE.NAME END AS TRBNAME, CASE WHEN TE2.NAME IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE TE2.NAME END AS RTNAME, CASE WHEN TE3.NAME IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE TE3.NAME END AS ATNAME, CASE WHEN TR.NAME IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE TR.NAME END AS MBRVNAME, CASE WHEN TR2.NAME IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE TR2.NAME END AS SBRVNAME, CASE WHEN TR3.NAME IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE TR3.NAME END AS ICRVNAME FROM TB_AS_LIST LIST LEFT JOIN TB_COMPANY COMP ON LIST.COMP_SEQ = COMP.COMP_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_TERMINAL_MODEL TM ON LIST.TID_SEQ = TM.TID_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_ERROR TE ON LIST.TRB_SEQ = TE.ORIGIN_SEQ AND TE.T_TYPE = 'T' LEFT JOIN TB_ERROR TE2 ON LIST.RT_SEQ = TE2.ORIGIN_SEQ AND TE2.T_TYPE = 'R' LEFT JOIN TB_ERROR TE3 ON LIST.AT_SEQ = TE3.ORIGIN_SEQ AND TE3.T_TYPE = 'A' LEFT JOIN TB_REVISION TR ON LIST.MAINBOARD_RV_SEQ = TR.SEQ AND TR.R_TYPE = 'MN' LEFT JOIN TB_REVISION TR2 ON LIST.SUBBOARD_RV_SEQ = TR2.SEQ AND TR2.R_TYPE = 'SB' LEFT JOIN TB_REVISION TR3 ON LIST.IC_RV_SEQ = TR3.SEQ AND TR3.R_TYPE = 'IC' WHERE 1 = 1 AND TO_CHAR(REG_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN #{sDate} AND #{eDate} AND SUPPORT_TYPE = 'R' ORDER BY CREATEDATE DESC
